title: Short Scroll
description:
Seamlessly scroll through YouTube Shorts with custom trigger points. Automate your YouTube Shorts experience with this lightweight, privacy-focused extension.

No more manual scrolling. No interruptions. Just seamless short-form content.

✅ Works in fullscreen & PiP mode
✅ Lightweight & privacy-focused
✅ Compatible with all Chromium browsers

Transform your YouTube Shorts experience today and remember to leave a review if you love it!
